original_title: Adventures in Odyssey: In Harm's Way
overview: When the new kid in town isn’t exactly cool, what’s a guy to do? Being nice is one thing, but letting him hang around with you . . . well, that’s another thing entirely. Can Dylan see past Elliot’s “nerdy” actions to his inner value? A critical choice and a powerful lesson await in this exciting tale of friendship and love.
title: Adventures in Odyssey: In Harm's Way
